seed_pair.known: Why are you not happy any more?

recent_seed_pairs.known: I don't know why you think that it's so good.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 我不知道为什么你认为它这么好。

recent_seed_pairs.known: Of course you can ask her because she's my friend.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 当然你可以问她，因为她是我的朋友。

recent_seed_pairs.known: It's more important to talk often than to be perfect.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 经常说话比完美更重要。

recent_seed_pairs.known: This was where my friend wanted to meet us.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 这是我朋友想要和我们见面的地方。

recent_seed_pairs.known: I'm sorry that I need to leave so early.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 对不起我需要这么早离开。

recent_seed_pairs.known: I'm sorry that I can't see what you're trying to show me.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 对不起我看不到你试图给我看的东西。

recent_seed_pairs.known: That's very kind of you and I'm grateful to you for helping.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 你真好，我很感激你帮助我。

recent_seed_pairs.known: It's the same thing as we were talking about earlier.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 这和我们之前谈论的是同一件事。

recent_seed_pairs.known: I woke earlier than I wanted to this morning.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 我今天早上醒得比我想要的早。

recent_new_legos.known: more important than to be perfect
where my friend wanted to meet us
recent_new_legos.target: 我朋友想要和我们见面的地方

practice_phrases: 我不再高兴了。
I'm not happy any more.
她不再高兴了。
She's not happy any more.
你为什么不再高兴了？
Why are you not happy any more?
我不知道你为什么不再高兴了。
I don't know why you're not happy any more.
对不起，我不再高兴了。
I'm sorry, I'm not happy any more.
没问题，她不再高兴了。
No problem, she's not happy any more.
当然，我的朋友不再高兴了，一切都好。
Of course, my friend is not happy any more, everything is okay.
我不知道为什么你不再高兴了，但我很感激你帮助我。
I don't know why you're not happy any more, but I'm grateful to you for helping.
这是我朋友想要和我们见面的地方，因为她不再高兴了。
This is where my friend wanted to meet us, because she's not happy any more.
当你和他们一起工作时你会知道为什么她不再高兴了，我需要这么早离开。
When you work with them you will know why she's not happy any more, I need to leave so early.
